ceterms:description:
Safety: The Safety assessment consists of 83 multiple choice questions. Candidates are allowed 90 minutes to complete the assessment.
Quality Practices and Measurement: The Quality assessment consists of 84 multiple choice questions. Candidates are allowed 90 minutes to complete the assessment.
Manufacturing Processes and Production: The Production assessment consists of 83 multiple choice questions. Candidates are allowed 90 minutes to complete the assessment.
Maintenance Awareness: The Maintenance assessment consists of 86 multiple choice questions. Candidates are allowed 90 minutes to complete the assessment.

ceterms:name: Certified Production Technician Recertification
